title: Parameters
base_energy_loss.tooltip: The base amount of energy deducted every ten minutes.
energy_floor.tooltip: The maximum energy at which Energy Rework's energy loss no longer occurs.
moving_energy_offset.tooltip: The amount of additional energy lost when running.
sitting_energy_offset.tooltip: The amount of energy gained every ten minutes while seated.
sitting_energy_ceiling.tooltip: The maximum energy at which Energy Rework's sitting energy gain no longer occurs.
